name: tuyens-claude-code
description: Opinionated Claude Code plugin for enterprise Java teams. Provides safe, review-focused slash commands for Spring Boot, JPA, and Java 21+ development. Enforces human oversight and prevents common architectural mistakes.
author: tuyens-claude-code

commands.name: architecture-review
commands.description: Review Java/Spring architecture decisions. Identifies layering violations, coupling issues, and suggests improvements without generating code.

commands.name: domain-model-review
commands.description: Analyze domain model design for DDD alignment, aggregate boundaries, and entity relationships. Flags modeling anti-patterns.

commands.name: api-design-review
commands.description: Review REST API design for consistency, versioning, error handling, and HTTP semantics. Does not generate endpoints.

commands.name: jpa-review
commands.description: Audit JPA/Hibernate mappings for N+1 queries, fetch strategies, cascade pitfalls, and schema alignment issues.

commands.name: transaction-review
commands.description: Analyze transaction boundaries, propagation settings, isolation levels, and potential deadlock scenarios.

commands.name: performance-review
commands.description: Identify Java performance concerns including memory allocation, collection usage, concurrency issues, and JVM tuning opportunities.

commands.name: security-review
commands.description: Security-focused review for injection risks, authentication gaps, authorization flaws, and data exposure vulnerabilities.

commands.name: test-strategy
commands.description: Evaluate test coverage strategy, testing pyramid balance, and identify gaps in unit/integration/contract testing.

agents.name: spring-architect
agents.description: Senior Spring Boot architect persona for architectural decisions

agents.name: java-performance-engineer
agents.description: Java performance engineer for optimization analysis

agents.name: security-engineer
agents.description: Application security engineer for vulnerability analysis

agents.name: test-engineer
agents.description: Test engineering specialist for quality strategy

agents.name: tech-lead-reviewer
agents.description: Tech lead persona for holistic code review
